name: Guest Soap-
description:
Delight your friends and family with these 1oz slices of Goat Milk Guest Soaps. Cut from the 'mother' bar, these beautiful chunks are the perfect size and shape to put in your guest bathroom.  
    They come in groups of five different scents to give you a sampling of the 'herd'. They also can be hung by their tweedy little strings. These rustic 'kid' soaps are wrapped in brown butcher paper  and tide up with string upon delivery. Very cool and unique for hostess and teacher gifts.

options.name: Stained Glass Set (seaglass, pomegranate, satsuma,lilac and peppermint mocha

name: Festival of Lights  Coming ... November 20th
description:
Cinnamon, gala apple, lemon rinds and nutmeg shavings.
Smells like winter. When you drink a delicious hot drink that smells like cinnamon. Yummy! 
Exclusive: Only available for the holidays

name: Shalom
description:
The perfect blend of orange, eucalyptus, patchouli and ylang ylang.
Another favorite. So unusual, so divine is the scent, so calming and peaceful. If peace had a scent it would smell like this. Shalom...

name: Yuzu
description: This is one of my favorites! One of the truest citrus scents I have found with a touch of floral. This is one of those long shower bars. By that I mean you can't help but pick it up over and over again, inhaling it's delicious notes as you check to make sure the soap is still as  rich and creamy as it was 2 minutes ago.

name: Santa's Tree Farm  Coming soon ..Nov 20th
description:
This soap smells like freshly cut evergreen branches. Reminiscent of walking through the woods in search for the perfect Christmas tree!
 Exclusively appearance for the Christmas season only. Yum!

name: Satsuma
description: A delicious smelling soap of Mandarin orange, orange peels and blooming petals of orange flower. Everything orange! A bright and clear scent.

name: Fresh Cut Roses   $5.75
description:
This beautiful soap is filled with rose petals and smells just like fresh cut roses! It's taken many years to find an acceptable rose scent that didn't smell too sweet or sickly. This one is it!  The rose petals act as an exfoliant while the goat milk and oils moisturize your skin. 
Give this to any rose gardener or your favorite aunt!

name: Ugly Soap
description:
Ugly soaps are any soaps that don't come out perfect. They may have spots or bumps or messy corners or just not up to my standards visually, but they are still a great bar of soap. Occasionally I take a bag of ugly soap to church and leave them on the counter in the kitchen and they literally fly off the shelf!  

I offer this soap as a discounted price to you so you too can reap the benefits of using Goat Milk soap.
Enjoy!

name: Oatmeal, Milk & Honey
description:
You could almost eat this soap it smells so delicious. But  don't! Rather, take it to the shower and lather yourself in the creaminess of it. You may be tempted to lick your arm, but resist! Just look forward to the everyday ritual of moisturizing your skin in this divine scent.
All soaps are made with rich creamy Goat Milk from the goats residing on a Johns Island farm in Charleston called Burden Creek.  Then they are blended with heavenly oils such as Olive, Palm and Coconut  and then super-fatted with either Mango, Shea or Cocoa Butter before being poured. They take 4 weeks to cure. Enjoy!

name: Soap of the Month Club - Join Today!!
description:
$25.00

This is the perfect gift for a favorite teacher, mother in law, daughter or son in law! Send the gift that keeps on giving... at least for 3 months that is. Goat milk soap is the BEST soap you will ever nourish your skin with. Once I started making it I never looked back at the old recipes. It is just too divine! You join the club and 3 different soaps will be sent out (one each month) to your favorite person.
Prices include all shipping and handling. For 3 months you pay only $5/bar.
If you have a favorite scent that we carry on our website, please feel free to mention it. Or if you know your recipient doesn't like a certain scent, you may mention it in a email when you order.

Each soap is lovingly wrapped in beautiful handmade paper that has been chosen especially with that scent in mind. It's the perfect gift for teachers, in-laws, weddings, anniversaries or any time you want to treat someone special! Enjoy!

name: Day at the Spa Collection - $5.75
description: Aqua Spa, Green Tea with Lemongrass, Rip Tide . Ingredients - Made with local Goat Milk, Pure Olive Oil, Coconut Oil and Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (a binder), and pure essential oils. All soaps are made with either natural Cocoa Butter, Mango or Shea Butter. Each soap is lovingly wrapped in beautiful handmade paper that has been chosen especially with that scent in mind. A perfect gift for men and women alike. Enjoy! Description of Scents - Aqua Spa: This is my husband's all time favorite! It has a clean fresh scent. Great for outdoor showers, especially in the summer! Green Tea & Lemongrass: New to the line! A classic spa scent. Very popular Lotion bar scent. Can't keep it on the shelf. Finally tried it as a soap. Very Nice... Rip Tide: A clean fresh scent. Both men and women like. This soap is filled with colorful soap shreds that give it a great look and texture.

name: Exotic Dark Collection - $5.75
description: Mayan Gold, Elijah, Egyptian Amber Ingredients - Made with local Goat Milk, Pure Olive Oil, Coconut Oil and Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (a binder), and pure essential oils. All soaps are made with either natural Cocoa Butter, Mango or Shea Butter. Each soap is lovingly wrapped in beautiful handmade paper that has been chosen especially with that scent in mind. A perfect gift for men and women alike. Enjoy! Mayan Gold: Delightful and delicious. Both men and women like this soap!

name: Herbal Classics Collection - $5.75
description: Lavender, Lemongrass with Calendula and Poppyseeds, and Chamomile & Lavender Ingredients - Made with local Goat Milk, Pure Olive Oil, Coconut Oil and Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (a binder), and pure essential oils. All soaps are made with either natural Cocoa Butter, Mango or Shea Butter. Each soap is lovingly wrapped in beautiful handmade paper that has been chosen especially with that scent in mind. A perfect gift for men and women alike. Enjoy! Description of Scents - Lavender: My sister-in-law, Janie, favorite soap. A creamy white bar made with the finest essential oil. An all time favorite and staple of Dizzy Dragonfly. Lemongrass with Calendula and Poppy-seeds: Lemon grass is one of the first soaps I made. It sells out quickly because of it's spicy citrus fragrance. Both men and women love this soap. It is great in the kitchen or the shower. Lavender Chamomile is a creamy white soap that enjoys the delightful blend of both of my two favorite herbs.

name: Farmer's Market Collection - $5.75
description: Midnight Pomegranate, Mud Pie, Ingredients - Made with local Goat Milk, Pure Olive Oil, Coconut Oil and Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (a binder), and pure essential oils. All soaps are made with either natural Cocoa Butter, Mango or Shea Butter. Each soap is lovingly wrapped in beautiful handmade paper that has been chosen especially with that scent in mind. A perfect gift for men and women alike. Enjoy! Description of Scents - Midnight Pomegranate: This is sweet smelling soap that both men and women like. I used to make it only around Christmas time, but people like to use it year round- so now it is available anytime. Mud Pie: This is the soap for the true gardener or hunter. Anyone who loves the smell of the earth. Or dirt.Not just any dirt. The soil your vegetables thrive in. The scent is addicting!

name: Flowers in the Garden Collection - $5.75
description: Lilac, Lily of the Valley, & Secret Garden. Ingredients - Made with local Goat Milk, Pure Olive Oil, Coconut Oil and Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (a binder), and pure essential oils. All soaps are made with either natural Cocoa Butter, Mango or Shea Butter. Each soap is lovingly wrapped in beautiful handmade paper that has been chosen especially with that scent in mind. A perfect gift for men and women alike. Enjoy! Description of Scents - Magnolia: This creamy white soap smells like the South. After moving to Charleston, SC I had to make this soap. It is one of my favorites. Not overpowering, but delicately delicious. Lilac: This is a beautiful grayish soap the truly smells like your grandmother's lilac tree. One of my favorite scents and a gentle reminder of why I started making soap in the first place. Lily of the Valley:A tiny little flower that packs a unforgettable scent! Sunflower: Sunflowers don't really have a scent...do they? But this sunflower soap smells like a summer garden to me. Topped with Calendula and course Seasalt. Nice! Secret Garden: Smells like a beautiful spring garden with all your favorite flowers! Intoxicating!

name: Multiple Mints Collection - $5.75
description: Garden Mint, & Peppermint Mocha, Eucalyptus Ingredients - Made with local Goat Milk, Pure Olive Oil, Coconut Oil and Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (a binder), and pure essential oils. All soaps are made with either natural Cocoa Butter, Mango or Shea Butter. Each soap is lovingly wrapped in beautiful handmade paper that has been chosen especially with that scent in mind. A perfect gift for men and women alike. Enjoy! All the mint soaps are popular. You can't go wrong if you are a mint lover. They have a way of waking you up in the shower! Enjoy!

name: Soaps by the Sea Collection - $5.75
description: Beach, & Sea Glass. Ingredients - Made with local Goat Milk, Pure Olive Oil, Coconut Oil and Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (a binder), and pure essential oils. All soaps are made with either natural Cocoa Butter, Mango or Shea Butter. Each soap is lovingly wrapped in beautiful handmade paper that has been chosen especially with that scent in mind. A perfect gift for men and women alike. Enjoy! Description of Scents - Beach: Yes, it really does smell like the beach! A very popular yummy bar that reminds you of summer vacations at the beach. A fresh, clean scent. Sea Glass: Ah, Sea Glass soap. One of my all time favorites. It smells like the sea, the beach, especially Folly Beach. A beautiful blue green bar that loves to live in beach houses and out door showers. Perfect for any coast!

name: Maranatha! Soap - $5.75
description:
Made with local Goat Milk, Pure Olive Oil, Coconut Oil and Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (a binder), and pure essential oils.  All soaps are made with either natural Cocoa Butter, Mango or Shea Butter. 

Each soap is lovingly wrapped in beautiful handmade paper that has been chosen especially with that scent in mind.  A perfect gift for men and women alike. Enjoy!

This is my favorite scent of all. It's a perfect blend of oak moss, geranium, grapefruit and cedar wood. It has a sweet peppery scent that reminds me of a fresh water pond hidden somewhere in the woods. Hard to describe but very distinctive.
Maranatha! means Come Lord Jesus!

name: Fig Tree
description:
Made with local Goat Milk, Pure Olive Oil, Coconut Oil and Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (a binder), and pure essential oils.  All soaps are made with either natural Cocoa Butter, Mango or Shea Butter. 

Each soap is lovingly wrapped in beautiful handmade paper that has been chosen especially with that scent in mind.  A perfect gift for men and women alike. Enjoy!

A sophisticated soap that both men and women are drawn to. It's a little earthy, a little clean and a little sweet... One of my favorites!  Also very popular as a Lotion Bar.

name: Sweet Tea Soap - $5.75 Ready
description:
Made with local Goat Milk, Pure Olive Oil, Coconut Oil and Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (a binder), and pure essential oils.  All soaps are made with either natural Cocoa Butter, Mango or Shea Butter. 

Each soap is lovingly wrapped in beautiful handmade paper that has been chosen especially with that scent in mind.  A perfect gift for men and women alike. Enjoy!

Sweet Tea: I never heard of this drink until I moved to the South. Now it is one of my favorite treats on a hot summer day, especially the way Carolyn makes it at church. Wowza! 
This soap reminds me of a glass of Sweet Tea on somebody's back porch. Yum!

name: Hand Poured 10" Beeswax Tapers
description:
These beautiful candles are first chipped off a huge block of delicious smelling local beeswax, then melted down very slowly, then lovingly colored according to the seasons. Then the wax is poured into antique style molds and then released with great excitement! Then they are wrapped in pairs with a band of  fine Italian paper and raffia and patiently waiting for You to buy them and light them at your dinner table. 
With no wind or drafts like AC or fans- these candles will burn up to 10 hours cleanly.
Colors are handcrafted- so no two are alike...be flexible :)

Please allow 1 week to make and ship!

name: Birthday Candles - $7.50
description:
Hand dipped beeswax birthday candles for that special occasion!

I make these candles for a local bakery called Sugar in Charleston, SC.  They sell in packs of 24 and come in beautiful jewel tones from local beeswax.  They burn cleanly and can be used over and over again for that special birthday.  Available also in the natural white and yellow.

name: Lotion Bars - $6.00
description:
Made with Beeswax, Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Mango Butter, and Babassu oil.  2 ounces solid.

I can't keep these in stock! Beautiful round bars made with exquisite moisturizing butters and delicious scents!
Comes in a 2oz round tin for easy storage.  Great  for travel, stocking stuffer, teacher's gift.  Very unique and wonderful! Try it! 

Choose from scents below. Special requests are welcomed if you don't see a scent you like. Just email.

name: Old Fashioned Shaving Soap with Bristle Boar Brush- $15.50 Available in November for the Holidays
description:
Made with Goat Milk, Coconut oil, Palm oil, Castor oil and Bentonite clay for easy slip while shaving.

Adored by both men and women.  This shaving soap comes in one scent only.  A delicious cinnamon, clove and cassia blend.  Fills a half pint jar about 5 oz of soap!  Perfect for those who love to shave the old fashioned way.  This tried and true recipe lathers beautifully!



(Does not come with jute bag)
